p: All animal work was performed in accordance with the Fiocruz Animal Use Committee (protocol P-60/14-4; license number LW-30/15). Fiocruz personnel are required to adhere to applicable federal, state, local and institutional laws and policies governing animal research, including the regulations from the Brazilian Council of Animal Use Control (CONCEA - 3rd Edition, published at Sep, 26, 2016), Federal Law 11794/08 and Protocols for Animal Useâ€”Oswaldo Cruz Research Foundation (ISBN: 85-7541-015-6).
